name: AT&T Access
fullDescription: AT&T is one of the largest telecommunications companies in the United States. AT&T Access provides affordable high-speed internet service to qualifying low-income households.
whatTheyOffer:
- Affordable high-speed internet service
- Free installation (no installation fees)
- No annual contract required
- In-home WiFi included
- Access to AT&T WiFi hotspots
howToGetIt:
1. Check if AT&T service is available at your address
2. Verify eligibility through SNAP, SSI, or other qualifying programs
3. Apply online at att.com/access or call customer service
4. Schedule installation appointment
5. No credit check required
keywords: AT&T, internet, affordable internet, low-income, SNAP, SSI, WiFi, broadband, no credit check, free installation
